summary: A complete overhaul of the Abandoned House near Morthal.
descriptionHtml:
[size=15][u]Abandoned Dark Brotherhood Shack Overhaul[/u][/size]

[size=10][u]A Powerful Overhaul for the Abandoned Shack![/u][/size]

[b]Mod Clashes/Collisions:[/b]

This mod shouldn\'t clash with any mods that DON\'T:

*Change the Abandoned Shack layout.
*Drastically change the area\'s surroundings.

[b]Requirements:[/b]

Official (Mods made by Bethesda):

A PC/Mac running The Elder Scrolls Skyrim!
The Update.esm
No DLC required at all!

[b]Overview:[/b]

I saw the Dark Brotherhood shack and thought to myself \"This could do more!\" and after a few hours I have finally come up with this. I have removed all the nasty blood stains and dirt, so the shack feels more habitable.

In the process however I have removed all the markers and everything else the shack relies on in the Dark Brotherhood quest. 

[b]Here\'s what I added:[/b]

Table and Benches
Cooking Pot and Grindstone
A wardrobe and chest of drawers
A dagger
Some coin purses


[b]Notes:[/b]

This is my first mod with the Creation Kit and the kit itself is much more fiddley than my experience with the GECK. So patience is a virtue!


Installation Instructions using Nexus Mod Manager:

1. Select \"Download with Manager\".
2. Wait for it to download.
3. Select the Mods tab.
3. Double click on the Mod called \"Abandoned Dark Brotherhood Shack Overhaul\".
4. Go back to the Plugins tab and click the check box to activate
5. Enjoy your new mod!

[b]Manual Installation:[/b]

1. Unzip Abandoned Dark Brotherhood Shack Overhaul.zip
2. Place the .esp file in the Data directory of Skyrim (usually in the Steam folder and under AppData and Common).
3. Using either the official launcher or NMM, click the checkbox and start playing!

[b]Requests:[/b]

This mod is seriously in the alpha stage and it requires some more work. Please give constructive feedback as I really benefit from that.

If you guys think something needs to be changed I may consider it in a future release.

[b]Licensing and Final Comments:[/b]

I hope you all enjoy this basic but powerful mod! Please give me feedback as I like feedback! Also this mod is 100% free and open-source so feel free to modify and redistribute just please credit me as Inferno986return.

Also special thanks to Xirifus for notifying me about BBCode!

[b]Please check out my other mods:[b]

Fallout 3 Mods:

Underworld Safehouse.

Fallout New Vegas:

Atomic Wrangler Room Mod 2

Oblivion:

Francois Mottierre\'s House Ownership Mod
author: Inferno986return
